name: Icing Cookie
description:
You are the cookie maker.
Bake some cookies and icing to make it loot delicious.
It's time to show your icing skill!

1. Knead the dough.
2. Cut out the dough.
3. Bake cookies.
4. Icing on cookies!

Easy four steps cookie making game.
Decorate cookies with icing to make them look delicious!

Collect keys to unlock cooking sheets.
Play more stages to unlock mystery bonus for rolling pins.
